items.title: 1- Boss Life 3D Strategy Guide
items.text:
Boss Life 3D puts you in charge of an office. You’re hiring, you’re firing, you’re dumping jelly on people. 
 It’s just like working in a real office, except with slightly less crushing misery. That said, there are some sections that might leave you stumped. 

 And that’s why we’ve written this guide. We’ve played a good chunk of the game and discovered some foolproof strategies that are going to take you all the way up the corporate ladder. 

 Whether you’re new to the game or you’ve already fired a few people for pooping in your desk, you’re going to find something here that’ll help you out. Here are the best hints, tips and cheats for Boss Life 3D.

items.title: 2- Tap when asked
items.text:
If you are instructed to tap the screen in the game, be sure to tap it. 
 If you have a certain level that you need to tap to move forward and you want to succeed, you don’t have to dig in long. Get ready to go as soon as the circle turns green. 
 Otherwise, you may miss a chance.

items.title: 3- Look at the picture
items.text:
Always check the information provided by the game. 
 Do you decide whether to confiscate contraband clothing, who to hire, or who to dismiss? 
 Look at what you are saying and then make the right decision.

items.title: 4- Match the stack
items.text:
At the level where you are filling a briefcase full of money, you need to combine stacks of equal value to make a larger pile.
 Instead of just sticking everything together, you need to match the stacks so that you can finally combine them at the right face value. There may be a stack left, but that’s okay.

items.title: 5- Don’t get caught
items.text:
Don’t spend your time pushing your luck at the level you are watching.
 Look at the vision cone of the person you are trying to deceive and act only if you are certain that it is not pointing in your direction. The same applies to the levels you need to be quiet.
 If you go slowly and play wisely, it will work.

items.title: 6- What’s the cash for?
items.text:
The cash isn’t really cash, in that there’s nothing you can actually spend it on. Just think of it as your score and move on.
 
 There’s no shop and no way of using your cash, so just focus on finishing the levels and moving on to the next.

items.text:
